text:
Hello all! We are having page speed issues with standard HS components. Although we tried to look for an answer to solve it, we couldn’t find any way to remove them. We are using a customized template in the CMS Pro.

Can someone gives us a hand?

<https://pagespeed.web.dev/report?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.destrava.ai%2F&hl=pt-BR&form_factor=mobile|Here> is the link to page speed analysis

And this is the list of the components that we couldn’t remove (nor find):
<https://js.hs-banner.com/v2/21917204/banner.js>
<https://static.hsappstatic.net/conversations-visitor-ui/static-1.14016/bundles/visitor.js>
<https://static.hsappstatic.net/HubSpot-dlb/static-1.332/bundle.production.js>
